title: Love at First Hate
overview: When a smart, handsome, and foul mouthed doctor â€˜Paniti' or Dr. Pup met a hot, sexy and thick superstar 'Kluay' who is not his type and also he is not her type. They hated each other at first sight, but when they have to live together, something strange happened; it looks like Dr. Pup is falling in love with Kluay. To saved his face from what he talked before that she is not his type, so he is trying to act and not to like her, but can he? What will the ending of this two be, haters or lovers?
